com.reportmill.shape

Class RMShapeEventAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reportmill.shape.RMShapeEventAdapter

  • public class RMShapeEventAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to listen for Swing events and send them on.
